name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - The Remains
summary: The Remains is a soon to be releasing mod for Steel Wool Studios' Five Nights at Freddy's Security Breach. This mod restores every single scrapped mission, model, map, minigame, ETC. Back into full functioning order! It will be free to download/play and available on several sites once released! We hope you enjoyed this trailer and we hope that we can deliver a great product for you all! Absolute Modding Team and affiliates do not permit ANY ungranted uses of our content includes trailers, teasers, or anything similar, unless for the purpose of posting a public reaction to the trailer! (AMT is the same team who made several mods that you might know such as "Montyverse", "The Chaos mod", and "The Multiverse Mod"!) We are in no way affiliated with the similar Security Breach mod "Blast To The Past" and never have been. We are not copying "Blast To The Past" and nor have we have thought to, both mods achieve different goals. Currently, we have no plans of making a similar mod for the Five Nights at Freddy's Security Breach free DLC, Ruin!
